data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Trà Vinh you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trà Vinh, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 21,971 believers in Trà Vinh against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Trà Vinh, Vietnam to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Trà Vinh, Vietnam that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Katu, Eastern people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, guide the church in Trà Vinh, Vietnam to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Trà Vinh.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Trà Vinh, Vietnam so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

location.name: Trà Vinh
location.people_groups_list: Khmer, Cham, Western, En, Pa Di, Arem
location.cities_list: Trà Vinh, Châu Thành, Trà Cú, Cầu Kè, Tiểu Cần
